text.title: part1_Wikinews interviews painter Pricasso on his art and freedom of expression

s.hi: How long can you paint with your penis at one time before it gets too tiring ?

p.s: At most Sexpo 's and Adult Expos I paint for 13 hours a day in half slots so I paint 20 plus paintings a day .
When I am painting I have to concentrate hard and go into a meditative state ; I do n't notice much going on around me until I have finished .

caption.s: Example of Pricasso applying paint before creating a piece of artwork .

s.hi: Other than your penis , what other parts of your body do you use in the painting process ?

p.s: : I quickly worked out that I could speed it up by using my testicles and butt cheeks to cover large areas in no time at all , but only recently do I paint the edges using my butt-crack , I call it the credit card swipe !

s.hi: How did you come up with the name Pricasso ?

p.s: : That was the heading they christened me with in the Picture Magazine interview in 2006 .
I realised it was Gold and took out the website and trademark .

s.hi: What 's the most positive reaction you 've had to one of your paintings ?

p.s: It is always satisfying to get applause when a painting is finished ; at most adult shows this happened all the time ; but I do like painting disabled people .

I have painted several people with severe
cerebral palsy
and they are over the moon with the result ; this gives me the most pleasure , as I do realise that they are still sexually active people and everyone should realise this .

s.hi: Have any of your paintings been featured in a gallery somewhere ?

p.s:
: I have entered the
Bald Archy
Exhibition in Australia every year and sold a few .

Also at an exhibition of politicians in Australia , and last November I went to
Miami
for the
Art undressed
exhibition and also painted 15 minute portraits there which was fun .

s.hi: Do you consider it a form of freedom of expression to create your artwork in the way you do with your penis ?

p.s: : When I first thought of the idea I was really thinking I could get invited to a few parties as the entertainment which I do regularly , but now I am getting a good style about my work and want to take it to the next level and be accepted as an innovator .

s.hi: A free society throws up these kinds of people , who exercise their freedom in unusual ways .

p.s:
â€” Cape Town former-Mayor
Helen Zille

hi.s:
In 2008 , prior to a Sexpo event in
South Africa
, you uploaded a video to the Internet of yourself painting a portrait of then-Mayor of Cape Town Helen Zille .
Why did you decide to do this ?
